mapper.insert: insert into community(comm_no, userid,comm_bullet_point, comm_title, comm_text, ip) values(comm_sq.nextval,#{userid},#{comm_bullet_point},#{comm_title},#{comm_text},#{ip})
mapper.select:
select count(b.comm_no) totalRecord from community b join member r on b.userid=r.userid
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'

select * from (select * from ( select b.comm_no, b.comm_bullet_point, b.comm_title, b.userid, r.username, b.comm_hit, to_char(b.comm_date,'MM-DD HH:MI') comm_date from community b join member r on b.userid=r.userid
and ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
order by b.comm_no desc )
where rownum<=${onePageRecord*nowPage} order by comm_no asc
)
where rownum <=${onePageRecord} order by comm_no desc
where rownum <=${lastPageRecord} order by comm_no desc
select comm_no, comm_title, comm_text from community where comm_no=${param1}
mapper.update: update community set comm_title=#{comm_title}, comm_text=#{comm_text} where comm_no=${comm_no} and userid=#{userid}
update community set comm_hit=comm_hit+1 where comm_no=${param1}
mapper.delete: delete from community where comm_no=${comm_no} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select filename from datafile where comm_no=${param1}
